function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Occupants’ activities and schedules may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases within the houses.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High energy usage from multiple electrical appliances","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High population density and movement in the residence","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Large number of rooms in each zone of the residence","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Different occupancy patterns in households increase the risk of disease spread due to movement of people between locations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High occupancy in living rooms from 2:00 to 10:00 p.m. increases the risk of disease transmission due to close contact.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Peak occupancy in the kitchen for lunch and dinner preparation increases the risk of disease transmission during meal preparation times.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High occupancy in the bathrooms during morning routines increases the risk of disease transmission due to shared use of facilities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Frequent use of electric appliances leads to increased internal heat gain, potentially contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Occupants habitually leaving lights on in unoccupied rooms may lead to poor ventilation and air quality, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Free electricity in kuwait may encourage excessive use of appliances and lighting, leading to higher energy consumption and potential environmental impacts.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High density of tv sets in living rooms and bedrooms increases the risk of airborne disease transmission within households.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Frequent use of personal computers in living rooms and bedrooms increases the risk of surface transmission of contagious diseases within households.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular use of vacuum cleaners can lead to the dispersion and circulation of dust, allergens, and pathogens within indoor environments.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent use of washing machines and dryers in the built environment can increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases through contaminated laundry.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Refrigerators are commonly used in kuwaiti residences for storing food, and the presence of multiple units in each residence may lead to cross-contamination if not maintained properly.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gas-based ovens in kuwait contribute to indoor air quality challenges and may pose a risk if not properly ventilated.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Centralized a/c systems operating all day long and throughout the summer season","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to control a/c unit cycles based on weather conditions","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Default a/c settings leading to high electricity consumption","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient thermostat settings leading to increased energy consumption","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mismatched schedules of lights and occupancy leading to energy waste","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cultural differences impacting energy consumption patterns","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate representation of local population’s lifestyle and energy consumption habits","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Habit of leaving lights on when rooms are unoccupied due to cheap electricity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Setting the a/c thermostat to lower temperatures than the comfort range","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Little changes in occupants’ attitude towards energy conservation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and infiltration levels in residences, leading to the potential spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor urban communities are most vulnerable to vector-borne diseases vbds due to lack of infrastructure and poor living conditions.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of community participation in disease control efforts reduces the effectiveness of preventative measures and policies.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of integration of health priorities in sustainable development goals could lead to neglect of vbd risks in urban environments.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness about health care costs of urban sprawl","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Heightened surveillance and mosquito control for urban vbd risks","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of investments in improving water storage, sanitation, and drainage in low-income areas","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Urban poverty as a driver of epidemics such as zika","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of indicators and targets for promoting sustainable urban development","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainties surrounding the spread of the virus","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Closure of entire cities and stringent measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Declaration of a global public health emergency","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid sharing of information leading to quick action","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of collaborative strategies in smart cities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overreliance on thermal cameras for outbreak detection","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of standardized protocols for smart city products","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fragmentation of information due to proprietary solutions in smart city products","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rise in the amount of health data generated by iot devices","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased data collection from iot devices may lead to privacy concerns and data sharing issues.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global data sharing and management may conflict with various countries’ laws and regulations, leading to legal challenges and regulatory non-compliance.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited accessibility of healthcare data to a select group of users may raise concerns of data equity and inclusivity.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to big data results in higher economic returns and increased influence for data controllers.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global competition for control of big data leads to geopolitical tensions and disputes.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"}]}
